select count(1) from interfaces
del_flag = 0 and name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') and url like CONCAT('%',#{url},'%') and method like CONCAT('%',#{method},'%')

select u.user_id as userId,u.user_name as userName,dp.exclude_field as excludeField from user u left join user_data ud on u.user_id = ud.user_id left join data_permission dp on ud.data_permission_id = dp.id

select r.role_id as roleId,r.role_name as roleName,dp.exclude_field as excludeField from role r left join role_data rd on r.role_id = rd.role_id left join data_permission dp on rd.data_permission_id = dp.id
